tool.name: PczBfactor
tool.description: : Extract residue bfactors x PCA mode from a compressed PCZ file.

param.name: outname_output_dat_path
param.label: output DAT,TXT,CSV name
param.help: Output Bfactor x residue x PCA mode file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Output PDB with Bfactor x residue x PCA mode file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: pczdump binary path to be used.

param.name: eigenvector
param.label: eigenvector
param.help: PCA mode (eigenvector) from which to extract bfactor values per residue (0 means average over all modes).

param.name: pdb
param.label: pdb
param.help: Generate a PDB file with the computed bfactors (to be easily represented with colour scale)
